description: Try our easy to follow Baked Artichokes with Cheese Filling recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Artichokes with Cheese Filling Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash artichokes and trim about 3cm from the tops. Discard the tough, outer leaves and trim the stems. Using either your fingers or a spoon, carefully remove the centre of the artichoke (it looks like fine hairs). Immediately submerge the artichokes into a large bowl of cold water to which you have added the lemon juice.

To make the filling, heat the oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until soft. Combine in a bowl with lemon zest, breadcrumbs, parsley, parmesan and Swiss cheese. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

Remove artichokes from the water and drain well. Using a teaspoon, fill each artichoke with the prepared mixture. Arrange in a small baking dish and add wine. Cover and bake for 20 minutes, then uncover for a further 10 minutes until golden.
